nodes.text: Maia Vefri was a female Human who lived during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She made her living as a merchant for Binary Star Realty aboard Carrick Station.

The Reputation Vendor for Binary Star Realty on the Republic Fleet, Maia Vefri and her Republic counterpart Nala Aldel were added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds.
